You're right it should be Rape = Sex(Privilege)
That way it works in proportion, and if there's no privilege or sex, there is zero rape. As privilege increases and sex is constant, the rape becomes greater. As the amount of sex increases and privilege stays constant, rape becomes greater. You could also have a combination of someone who has almost no privilege at all lock someone else in a dungeon and molest them for years and it wouldn't be nearly the level of rape as if Donald Trump kissed a black disabled transgender muslim.

I think the Entire History of you would be better for someone to get their feet wet. It's not overly dark or creepy or even philosophical like say White Christmas , but it's a much better episode than nosedive. I think it's more plausible as a scenario too. The episode portrays human tendencies to want to capture and relive every moment, coupled with a very plausible piece of technology that would allow them to do just that. There's even contact lenses that can record video being built/already built IIRC.

I agree with you that the controls as is are horrible for dark souls. I had to remap everything and it took time to get used to. After doing about 6 playthroughs with those controls I'm probably just as comfortable as you are with a controller.

I totally disagree. I started out using the PC controls and got used to the controls. I could switch to a controller if I wanted but I use a mouse and keyboard for every other game so I'd rather stick with what I'm comfortable with. I think whatever controls a person is best is superior. I also don't care how it was "meant" to be played. It really makes no difference to me at all. I like being able to dodge with the space bar, using mouse buttons to attack, using shift to hold up my shield and using r to parry. Most of all, I much prefer a mouse when looking around as opposed to a right joystick . I've played ds3 with a friend and used a controller. It's not a different experience at all really. It's just a matter of getting used to controls.
After changing around the keys it's really not bad at all. Plus, I've seem someone beat the game with donkey kong bongos.
I use a mouse and keyboard, so I actually tap r to parry.

Sometimes it's not even when I'm miserable. I find it grounding and it makes me feel appreciation for the truly meaningful things in life.

Yes all the time. I can never come up with a solid stance on abortion, but I'm perfectly happy to point out flawed arguments and to support arguments that i find compelling. Pretty much the same when it comes to the transgender debate. Can a biological man be a woman or vice versa? I personally don't think so. I understand the argument that gender is separate from biological sex, but in all reality the concept of gender derives from biological sex. Try and describe a persons gender, without speaking in terms of male and female. You can't. In my mind, no matter how feminine a man is, he is still biologically male. If he believes himself to be a woman, he has an incorrect belief. I have no problem with a dude wearing a dress or makeup or whatever. Do what you want, but you're not a woman no matter how much you believe you are. However I cannot stand how ignorant people hate on them, claim they are just perverts, and that it's morally wrong etc. Let people live. There's no reason why a person can't express themselves and be who they want.

Jokes aside there's room for interpretation. That's the point. Are they just really complex machines that uncannily mimic human behavior, or are they actual beings?
Edit: also Nick's memories and personality are not his own, they've been uploaded to him from someone else.
When you think you don't have a hangover and then you sit up
what are you talking about? synths aren't people. They're just machines.

What is an identity though? It's a collection of what we do, who we interact with, our likes and dislikes, beliefs etc. In all reality none of those things are what we really are. We come up with a narrative and identity to describe this sort of "person" we are but in reality it's just an illusion. That's why I suppose we shouldn't care so much about identity and should seek to understand the world in the most objective way possible. Obviously there are limits to that as we are creatures that have limits to perception , biases etc. I believe gender is totally unnecessary and meaningless as an identity. Just like i think sexuality is pointless as an identity .
Edit: i don't mean to say that we should do away with identity completely. obviously we all need names and we need a way to understand and identity people. but I really believe that indulging in concepts like gender are nothing more than self obsession. It's not reality.

I don't mean in a social way, I mean as in distinguishing between humans. As in the way I would distinguish a European person from an Asian person. Objective differences. I am not concerned with how people view themselves subjectively.

What purpose would going extinct achieve? What is the end goal? The entire reason we want to preserve the environment is so that we can live happily on a healthy planet. There's nothing to evaluate to say if the planet is better or not without our existence because we don't exist. It's like solving world hunger by killing everyone in the world. It solves the problem of starvation but not in a meaningful way.

If an undead comes along after you and links the fire, the age of dark is delayed yet again. If this continues on and on forever, is the age of dark really inevitable? It only becomes inevitable if there is no undead to link the fire, or no undead chooses to link the fire. It seems then that linking the fire could be a really positive ending. Life can continue on if there is someone willing to make the ultimate sacrifice.

i know im going to get flak for this, but if she doesnt say no or indicate that she wants to stop, then it cant be considered rape. If a cop shoots me because i didn't put my hands up, but he never said to put my hands up, whose fault is that? im not doubting that someone would freeze up but if someone starts kissing you and doing sexual stuff and you dont pull away or say stop, why would they have any reason to think you want to stop?
